content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseDelimitedTextFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT ,
	       FORMAT_OPTIONS (
			 FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
			 USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE
			))
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'workspace_covid19dtywy3evjk25c_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [workspace_covid19dtywy3evjk25c_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://workspace@covid19dtywy3evjk25c.dfs.core.windows.net', 
		TYPE = HADOOP 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE stg.cosmos_covidpolicy_stg (
	[CountryName] nvarchar(4000),
	[CountryCode] nvarchar(4000),
	[RegionName] nvarchar(4000),
	[RegionCode] nvarchar(4000),
	[Jurisdiction] nvarchar(4000),
	[Date] nvarchar(4000),
	[C1_School closing] nvarchar(4000),
	[C1_Flag] nvarchar(4000),
	[C2_Workplace closing] nvarchar(4000),
	[C2_Flag] nvarchar(4000),
	[C3_Cancel public events] nvarchar(4000),
	[C3_Flag] nvarchar(4000),
	[C4_Restrictions on gatherings] nvarchar(4000),
	[C4_Flag] nvarchar(4000),
	[C5_Close public transport] nvarchar(4000),
	[C5_Flag] nvarchar(4000),
	[C6_Stay at home requirements] nvarchar(4000),
	[C6_Flag] nvarchar(4000),
	[C7_Restrictions on internal movement] nvarchar(4000),
	[C7_Flag] nvarchar(4000),
	[C8_International travel controls] nvarchar(4000),
	[E1_Income support] nvarchar(4000),
	[E1_Flag] nvarchar(4000),
	[E2_Debt contract relief] nvarchar(4000),
	[E3_Fiscal measures] nvarchar(4000),
	[E4_International support] nvarchar(4000),
	[H1_Public information campaigns] nvarchar(4000),
	[H1_Flag] nvarchar(4000),
	[H2_Testing policy] nvarchar(4000),
	[H3_Contact tracing] nvarchar(4000),
	[H4_Emergency investment in healthcare] nvarchar(4000),
	[H5_Investment in vaccines] nvarchar(4000),
	[H6_Facial Coverings] nvarchar(4000),
	[H6_Flag] nvarchar(4000),
	[H7_Vaccination policy] nvarchar(4000),
	[H7_Flag] nvarchar(4000),
	[H8_Protection of elderly people] nvarchar(4000),
	[H8_Flag] nvarchar(4000),
	[M1_Wildcard] nvarchar(4000),
	[StringencyIndex] nvarchar(4000),
	[StringencyIndexForDisplay] nvarchar(4000),
	[StringencyLegacyIndex] nvarchar(4000),
	[CStringencyLegacyIndexForDisplay] nvarchar(4000),
	[GovernmentResponseIndex] nvarchar(4000),
	[GovernmentResponseIndexForDisplay] nvarchar(4000),
	[ContainmentHealthIndex] nvarchar(4000),
	[ContainmentHealthIndexForDisplay] nvarchar(4000),
	[EconomicSupportIndex] nvarchar(4000),
	[EconomicSupportIndexForDisplay] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'covid_policy_tracker.csv',
	DATA_SOURCE = [workspace_covid19dtywy3evjk25c_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM stg.cosmos_covidpolicy_stg
GO
